and madangky=$madangky$
and maphongban='$maphongban$'

SELECT * FROM Dangkyvanphongpham_chitiet WHERE xoa='0'
and madangky=$madangky$
SELECT count(*) FROM m_donvi_phongban WHERE xoa = '0'
